About.name: Einar Logi.
About.paragraph1: I'm a software developer, designer, and tech enthusiast based in Iceland. I love building things - whether it's web apps, cool designs, or tiny shrimp ecosystems in my aquarium (seriously, I have way too many).
About.paragraph2: In my free time I'm probably out running, painting Blood Angels for Warhammer 40k, or figuring out how to make my website just a little bit cooler.
About.paragraph3: Right now, I'm working on JITR, a staffing platform, and also launching my own web development service. If you need a great website or just want to talk tech, feel free to reach out!
